body_html:
@reedwm

/CC @zhangyaobit, any ideas what is happening here? The error message is complaining there is no GPU kernel for int32, but then in the list of supported combinations lists GPU with int32.

That was what bugged me also. When i tried to looks https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow issues for already existing bugs, the similar bugs were coherant (even if I have no idea what that actually means in detail).

@zhangyaobit

@tychota Thanks for reporting the issue. Could you provide a minimal example to reproduce the error?

(note that I have given a reproductible example, clearly not minimal in the first post : have you seen it ? Just to be sure that you have seen it and need something smaller because it can be really involving with my actual skill to find the root cause, see below.)

I would love to find the root cause and build and Minimal Failing Example but I did not find anyway to do a link between ReverseV2_1-1-DimMapNHWCToNCHW-LayoutOptimizer and any code from https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/tree/2d74b1300fef6700e75af7f2344d852798b713fb

There is two "reverse" occurences:

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/0afa4e84b35967380bcfc3021fb748de8b8b7091/model.py#L274

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/0afa4e84b35967380bcfc3021fb748de8b8b7091/model.py#L289

and no "layout" or "Optimizer" except a "MomentumOptimizer":

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/a3903ccd1693a94c4a506c3ec0ee8b94f288edb3/train.py#L105

I'm really noob with tf (just started a few weeks ago); butI can try to build a minimal reproduction if you give me some pointer / pseudo code to help me going in the right direction.
body_text:
@reedwm

/CC @zhangyaobit, any ideas what is happening here? The error message is complaining there is no GPU kernel for int32, but then in the list of supported combinations lists GPU with int32.

That was what bugged me also. When i tried to looks https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow issues for already existing bugs, the similar bugs were coherant (even if I have no idea what that actually means in detail).
@zhangyaobit

@tychota Thanks for reporting the issue. Could you provide a minimal example to reproduce the error?

(note that I have given a reproductible example, clearly not minimal in the first post : have you seen it ? Just to be sure that you have seen it and need something smaller because it can be really involving with my actual skill to find the root cause, see below.)
I would love to find the root cause and build and Minimal Failing Example but I did not find anyway to do a link between ReverseV2_1-1-DimMapNHWCToNCHW-LayoutOptimizer  and any code from https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/tree/2d74b1300fef6700e75af7f2344d852798b713fb
There is two "reverse" occurences:

body:
@reedwm

> /CC @zhangyaobit, any ideas what is happening here? The error message is complaining there is no GPU kernel for int32, but then in the list of supported combinations lists GPU with int32.

That was what bugged me also. When i tried to looks https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow issues for already existing bugs, the similar bugs were coherant (even if I have no idea what that actually means in detail).

@zhangyaobit

> @tychota Thanks for reporting the issue. Could you provide a minimal example to reproduce the error?

(note that I have given a reproductible example, clearly not minimal in the first post : have you seen it ? Just to be sure that you have seen it and need something smaller because it can be really involving with my actual skill to find the root cause, see below.)

I would love to find the root cause and build and Minimal Failing Example but I did not find anyway to do a link between `ReverseV2_1-1-DimMapNHWCToNCHW-LayoutOptimizer`  and any code from https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/tree/2d74b1300fef6700e75af7f2344d852798b713fb

There is two "reverse" occurences:

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/0afa4e84b35967380bcfc3021fb748de8b8b7091/model.py#L274

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/0afa4e84b35967380bcfc3021fb748de8b8b7091/model.py#L289

and no "layout" or "Optimizer" except a "MomentumOptimizer":

https://github.com/lightvector/GoNN/blob/a3903ccd1693a94c4a506c3ec0ee8b94f288edb3/train.py#L105

I'm really noob with tf (just started a few weeks ago); butI can try to build a minimal reproduction if you give me some pointer / pseudo code to help me going in the right direction.
